homepage.title: DiaCare - Diabet Dietasi Ilovasi
homepage.subtitle: Diabetni boshqarish uchun shaxsiy retseptlar va ovqatlanish rejalarini yarating
homepage.description: Diabetingizni samarali boshqarish uchun mo'ljallangan kuchli vosita. Shaxsiy retseptlar oling, ovqatlanishni kuzating va sog'lom turmush tarzini saqlang.

personalizedRecipes.title: Shaxsiy Retseptlar
personalizedRecipes.description: Sizning diabet turingiz va afzalliklaringizga mos retseptlar oling

nutritionTracking.title: Ovqatlanishni Kuzatish
nutritionTracking.description: Karbohidrat, oqsil va yog'larni osonlik bilan kuzating

mealPlanning.title: Ovqat Rejalashtirish
mealPlanning.description: Haftalik ovqat rejalarini yarating va qon shakarini barqaror saqlang

recipeGeneration.title: Retsept Yaratish
recipeGeneration.subtitle: Sizning ehtiyojlaringizga mos diabetik retsept yarating
